short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record macros to automatically perform actions or submit forms on user defined websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SiteMacro is intended for automating simple actions performed on websites, e.g. to automatically click "Not now" after logging into a website, or to automatically accept the terms of use of a free WiFi frequently used.

In these cases, visit the page you want to automate, click the SiteMacro toolbar button, choose "Record Macro" and perform the task to execute on the site (e.g. fill forms, click links or buttons). If your task does not include leaving the site, you then have to click "OK" in the red notification bar, otherwise leaving the site will confirm the macro. Once you visit the page again, SiteMacro will re-execute the recorded steps. Alternatively, you can manually start the macro through the SiteMacro toolbar button.
